import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import '../css/met.css'; import numeral from "numeral"; function Main() { const [worldInfo, setWorldInfo] = useState({}); const [countries, setCountries] = useState([]); const [continents, setContinents] = useState([]); const [continentsT, setContinentsT] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setWorldInfo(data); }); }, []); useEffect(() => { const getCountries = async () => { fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/countries') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { const countries = data.map((country) => ({ country: country.country, cases: country.cases, deaths: country.deaths, recovered: country.recovered, active: country.active, critical: country.critical, })); setCountries(countries); }); } getCountries(); }, []); return (

CoronaVirus Test

1.7 million people died in the world due to the Corona Virus

CoronaVirus is a dangerous threat to the elderly, children and families

Please do the CoronaVirus test to protect our world!

CoronaVirus Test

    { countries.map((country, i) => (
  • {++i}{country.country}
    • {numeral(country.recovered).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.deaths).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.cases).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.active).format('0,0')}
    • {numeral(country.critical).format('0,0')}
    • )) }

World

  • 1Cases
    • {numeral(worldInfo.cases).format('0,0')}
  • 2Deaths
    • {numeral(worldInfo.deaths).format('0,0')}
  • 3Recovered
    • {numeral(worldInfo.recovered).format('0,0')}
  • 4Active
    • {numeral(worldInfo.active).format('0,0')}
  • 5Critical
    • {numeral(worldInfo.critical).format('0,0')}
  • 6Tests
    • {numeral(worldInfo.tests).format('0,0')}
); } export default Main;
